titleStmt.title: Horæ succisivæ, or, Spare-houres of meditations upon our duty to [brace] God, others, our selves / by Ios. Henshaw.
titleStmt.author: Henshaw, Joseph, 1603-1679.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition corrected and much inlarged.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Badger for Ralph Mabb,

notesStmt.note: The statement of responsibility appears after the edition statement.
Imperfect: torn and tightly bound, with print show-through and slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.
